rules: You are working on the thop project - a terminal session manager for AI agents.
When running commands via the Bash tool, you may be inside thop itself.
Check for thop by running: echo $THOP_SESSION
If THOP_SESSION is set, you can use thop slash commands to switch between local and remote sessions.
The thop plugin (plugins/thop.ts) provides complete instructions when thop is detected.
